story: We met, we laughed, we road-tripped, and said yes. We can't wait to celebrate with you.

schedule.title: CEREMONY
schedule.desc: St. John Marie Vianney Parish Church Silang
schedule.note: The ceremony will begin on time. Your presence at the church is deeply meaningful to us.

ceremony.label: St. John Marie Vianney Parish — Lalaan II, Silang, Cavite (Diocese of Imus)
ceremony.gmapsQuery: St. John Marie Vianney Parish Lalaan II Silang Cavite

reception.label: Fruella's Events Venue Tagaytay — 144 Daang Luma, Brgy. Salaban, Amadeo, Cavite
reception.gmapsQuery: Fruella's Events Venue Tagaytay 144 Daang Luma Salaban Amadeo Cavite

stays.title: STAYS
stays.subcopy: We are pleased to share a selection of recommended accommodations for our big day.
stays.label: OUR RECOMMENDATIONS

travel.title: TRAVEL GUIDE
travel.subcopy: To make your stay even more memorable, here's a curated list of places to lounge and enjoy.

attire.note: To honor the theme of the occasion, we kindly ask all guests to strictly follow our color palette.

women.title: WOMEN
women.guidelines: Strictly long formal gown — Pale Blue, Pale Gray, Pale Green.

men.title: GENTLEMEN
men.guidelines: Black formal suit with white dress shirt, black bow tie or neck tie, and black shoes.

slides.alt: Bowtie or Necktie and Black shoes

faq.q: Can I bring a plus one?
faq.a: This is an intimate wedding with limited seating. Kindly note that only named guests in the invitation are included.

faq.q: How do we get to the ceremony and reception venue?
faq.a: We recommend coming by car or booking a Grab for convenience. For directions, please refer to the Venue section where you'll find links to Waze and Google Maps for easy navigation.

faq.q: Are there available guest parking slots at the venue?
faq.a: Yes, parking slots are available for both the ceremony and reception venue.

rsvp.thanksMessage: Thank you! We've received your RSVP.
rsvp.closedMessage: RSVP is now closed. Please contact the couple directly.

theme.sans: 'Inter', system-ui, -apple-system, Segoe UI, Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif
